attributes.action: make SINGLE SEX boarding school COMPULSORY for EVERY school child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reading about this 13 year old father - what was he DOING having a child at that age?!  He should have stuck to his EDUCATION rather than chasing girls.

Secondly I think it's an excellent idea to have boarding school then children wouldn't need to go home just because of snow!!!  Children have it TOO EASY these days
